inn1.comm: and movement straight away, Porterfield who got out for a first-ball duck the other day thinks of leaving and then unintentionally guides it on the bounce to the keeper
back of a length at 130 kph, good bounce for Zaheer, Porterfield has a flail and misses outside off

dropped by Yusuf at second slip. Full and again moving away from Porterfield, he throws his bat hard at it and gets a healthy outside edge. Yusuf makes an overwhelming effort, jumping high to palm it into the air, and then made an underwhelming effort to pluck it on the rebound. He moves slowly to his left and was reluctant to dive. Ireland off to an edgy start

that's a Zaheer special, and Stirling has lost his stumps. 134 kph, angles across the batsman at a good length, inviting the drive and then zipping inwards of the track to crash into the pitch. Stirling went for the check-drive without moving his feet across or forward and the ball gladly snaked through the bat-pad gap.
Zaheer is hitting the seam with a vengeance here. 126 kph only, but lands outside off and darts away from Joyce who wisely lets it go
and he ends the over with one that holds its line, Joyce covers the angle and defends.
straight away he hits the Munaf length, short of driving length and holds its line as it whistles across Porterfield who lets it go

that's clocked at 139.5 kph, but I doubt if Munaf is capable of such pace these days. Over-pitched outside off, Porterfield cracks it off the foot through the covers. Poor ball and a very good shot, made possible by Porterfield's decisive movement onto the front foot
back of a length again, not much movement for Munaf, Porterfield lets it go
and as I say that, Munaf cuts one away daintily off the track, leavinf Porterfield fishing and fumbling as he tries to cover the line
closer to off stump and holding its line as it buzzes past Porterfield who shoulders arms
one rubbish ball, but otherwise a fine over from Munaf who gets another offcutter to nip past the outside edge as Porterfield gropes for it from the crease
Zaheer keeps it short of driving length, early 130s, Joyce comes forward and defends watchfully

whoa, the Irish need to settle down here. Joyce jumps out of the crease and to the off stump line even as Zaheer gets into delivery stride, and then goes hard at an away-swinger. Yusuf at second slip dives to his left but can't get there, the ball was traveling. Dhoni and Zaheer consult on whether they should have a third slip ...

this is stupendous from Zaheer. He's been moving them away like a charm all along, and then just for fun, he gets one to jag back off the seam. Joyce was obviously expecting another one that moved away, and in an attempt to cover the deviation was groping outside the line. Too bad. Zaheer got it to go the other way and kiss the inside edge on the way to Dhoni
length ball, short of a length and defended off the front foot
slips too far down the leg side and Niall gets some pad on it on the way to fine leg
comes in from wide of the crease at 127 kph, no movement off the track this time and Niall defends solidly
and he starts with a rippa. Lands on off stump from round the wicket and then more than straightens, past the outside edge.
short of a length on the stumps, Porterfield hangs back and defends
another one slides past the outside edge as Porterfield comes half forward and feels with an angled face
gets bat on this one, defends from the crease and plays it out to the off side
defended again, tight stuff from Yusuf, gets them to straighten from the off stump without over-pitching
maiden for Yusuf, he's bowled six balls on the same spot and Porterfield defends again
back of a length and a hint of extra bounce into Niall who hangs back and fends away to the leg side
fuller and a foot wider of off stump, Niall is watching them closely here. Lets it go through to Dhoni as it holds its line.
hits the bat hard this time, nice lengths and decent carry around off stump, Niall reaches forward and plays it to the off side
over-pitched this time, Niall had the opportunity to drive but found the fielder at cover.
again, that menacing bit of seam away from the leg hander. Niall has to adjust late to cover the movement and defend it off the outside half of the face to the off side
another maiden, Zaheer drops short, but it's not quite a half-tracker. Niall goes for the cut, and finds point
flighted on the leg stump line and worked off the front foot to the leg side

first run in 15 balls, comes in rather fortuitous circumstances as Porterfield goes for the sweep in hope from well outside off and against sharp spin. The top edge balloons up dangerously but finds an untenanted patch to land on, backward of square leg
fired in quicker, gets it to slide into Niall who is late on the glide but gets a couple to the off side
tossed up on the pads, worked gingerly to the leg side
hangs back in the crease to a ball straightening from outside off stump and steers for a single through point
Porterfield plays back to the last delivery, short of a length and straightening, defended down the track
nothing to drive on offer, Zaheer keeps it back of a length and Joyce can't get to the pitch though he presses forward. Defended to the off side
over-pitched on middle and off, a rare shot of confidence and control from Niall who drives fluently through mid on. Harbhajan runs across and dives to keep it down to a single
back of a length on off stump again, Porterfield tries to angle it away square, and finds point

that's more like the Ireland we expected to see. Zaheer bangs one in short, and it sits up like a lollypop. Porterfield goes for the pull and times it with a vengeance. It flies away in front of square
enough of the short stuff says Zaheer, gets it on a length around off stump and it is defended to the off side
again, draws Porterfield forward into a defensive stroke to the off side.
flighted on leg stump and defended off the front foot to the leg side
moves over to the off stump line, Niall leans out and defends to the off side
turns away from outside off, short of a length and poked to the off side
whoa, opens up Porterfield like a can of beans, as they say. Drifts in from wide of the crease, lands on off, grips and breaks away, past the reluctant fish outside off and through to Dhoni
Porterfield jumps out to the pitch and works it from outside off towards mid on
back of a length again to end the over and straightening into Porterfield who defends from the crease
full delivery on the toes, Niall looks to flick but can't get it away
ah, iffy single there as Niall reaches across and dabs with soft hands to the right of Yuvraj at point. He collects and has a shy but misses at the bowler's end.
hmm, inside edge this time  as Zaheer slants one in alarmingly from outside off, Niall goes for the on drive and nicks it onto the pads.

crunched away, Niall has 1000 ODI runs with a very precise cover drive that left point jumping to his left and cover to his right. That was landed full, but Niall's opening of the wrists was perfect to find the gap
Zaheer tightens the line, its on off stump and defended down the track
another one over-pitched, this time Niall attemps the square drive and it is intercepted well by a tumbling Yuvraj at point.
Harbhajan will think of a silly point now, defended with hard hands to the off side, and it pops up through the vacant area
Niall is looking a little confused, trying hard to read the extent of spin and cover it from the pitch of the ball. He nearly gets an outside edge into the slips this time
short of a length, just enough to tempt the cut, Gambhir does well square on the off side to deny the runs
flighted on off stump, Niall reaches out and defends to the off side
too full this time, Niall gets the cover drive away and Chawla doesn't stop cleanly as he dives at cover

poor shot to end the over, faster one outside off, grips and turns away while offering the illusion of being shorter than it was. Porterfield goes for a booming carve off the back foot and misses as it turns past his outside edge
short of a length and angling across in search of the outside edge. Quietly dabbed to third man for one
short of a length on middle and leg, defended solidly down the pitch
lands on off and holds its line, defended to the off side without much fuss. Munaf's not getting an inch of movement. And he's not missing the spot by an inch either.
again, short of a length in the early 130s. A few more ks and he can aspire to be McGrath.
on leg stump, defended to the leg side from the crease
ends by tucking him up for lack of room on off stump, Porterfield defends towards mid off
Drifter, holds its line as it angles in from off stump, the forced cut is attempted and not executed too well
drifts down the leg side for a wide
tossed up and turning away, Niall drives into the covers past Chawla who chases rather lethargically.
again looking for the edge by eliciting the drive, Niall gets to the pitch of the ball and times it well to cover
back of a length on off stump and breaking away, defended to the off side off the front foot
lands this a foot shorter, Niall jumps back for the cut and gets it away to point

ahem, Harbhajan fooled him with the length there, it wasn't as full as Niall thought and he ended up fumbling from the crease to a delivery that drifted towards leg stump. Squeezed off the inside edge through square leg. Might have been two, but they settle on a single
at Munaf's pace, anything off-line is early Christmas. This one is short and on middle and leg, Niall gets over the bounce and whip-pulls it through square leg
again on the pads, Niall misses the flick and it runs off the pads to the leg side for one
they hustle a quick single, Munaf again strays on the pads and is on-driven to the left of Harbhajan at mid on.
too straight. Another easy whip off the pads through square leg for one.

wellm you got to credit Munaf for consistency. Again on the pads, again worked down to backward square leg for one. He's chirping away at the batsmen, rubbing his palms on the soil to get a better grip. All's not well with Munaf.
finally gets one on off stump, and it is steered backward of point.
flighted on the off stump, driven with the spin towards mid off.
tossed up generously, but outside leg stump and an easy on-drive through midwicket for one

well, even Shane Warne would think that's a little ambitious. Harbhajan seems to want to bowl the left-handers round the legs from round the wicket. And he's landing them a foot outside leg stump. Another easy single once Niall gets to the pitch of it.
better line, on off and inviting the drive into the off side, this time Porterfield gets a single
short ball, Niall misses out as he cuts straight to cover
flighted so much, that got into the airport radar. Niall leans out to the pitch of it and punches past short cover for one
speared in from round the wicket and straightening, cut from outside off stump into the off side
hmm, dangerous from Niall going back late and cutting from off stump line. He gets bat on it this time
tossed a touch further up, driven without much timing down the track
back of a length on off stump, Porterfield plays back carefully

oho, was that lucky on inventive? Only Porterfield will know, as he goes down on a knee and bunts a leg stump ball, across the line, and over the fielders on the leg side inside the circle. Good enough for a couple
pushed through on off stump to end the bowling Powerplay, played out to the off side
nice bowling from Bhaj, tossed up on middle and breaking away sharply, searching for the outside edge. Played away to the off side
and again, Harbhajan mysteriously lands a foot outside leg stump. Easy single through wide mid on
tossed up on middle stump, Porterfield gets to the pitch and eases a single through mid off for one
that's hideously short outside off and breaking away, he had enough time to cut it anywhere and got it away well in front of square for a couple
tossed up on the toes to end the over, Niall defends with undue caution

another shocker of a short ball. India are losing their intensity here, and nothing typifies it as much as Munaf's trundling effort to tag that ball, sweeping at cover point. Doesn't sprint, dive or even put the boot out. Pathetic.
tossed up on the leg stump, driven to mid on
fullish on the stumps, forced in front of square for one more
drops short this time outside off, Porterfield cuts well and gets a single through the covers
on leg stump, Porterfield looks to whip off the pads but finds the fielder at midwicket
flight to end the over, Porterfield drives solidly through mid off for one. Ireland are laying the platform for KOB pretty well here.
turns from off stump to leg stump, clipped through square leg for thr 50th run of the stand
Piyush needs more flight, short ball turning down the leg side and tucked through square leg

that turned like a fiend, but would have been short and wide even for a right hander. For a left hander, it is just a horror ball, slipping between the keeper and leg slip for four. And he's over-stepped.
Bang, bang, he shot me down! Piyuch flights the free-hit wide of leg stump, Porterfield goes down on a knee and swings it into the deep square leg stands for the World Cup's 100th six.
googly, too short and breaking away, Porterfield could have spotted the turn off the track and cuts into the covers
over-pitched on middle stump, Porterfield drives down the ground for a single through mid off
slider outside off, Niall deftly deflects it backward of square for a single. 15 runs off his opening over, Ireland go to drinks on a high.
Yusuf begins with a short of length ball that is chopped towards sweeper cover for a single
on legstump this time, defended down the track
pitches it outside leg and turns it into the pads, defended once more
full ball on the pads, tucked towards square leg
more legstump bowling, carefully guided towards midwicket
full and outside leg, worked to square leg for another comfortable single, no trouble for Ireland in that over
Chawla round the wicket, tossed up and outside off, driven down
length ball turning past the bat as the batsman looks to defend off the front foot, struck on the pads but that was going down
flighted delivery that turns sharply in, inside-edged onto the pad, loud appeal for lbw
a touch short from Chawla, batsman rocks back and chops it towards point
Chawla generously provides Porterfield some width, carved towards deep point for a couple
a length ball on off to end the over, punched to long-off for an easy single, Ireland march on to 81/2, the run-rate's not great, but these two are looking confident now
tossed up and fullish from Yusuf, lap-swept very fine, Tendulkar does the fielding at fine leg
gets this one to spin, past the outside edge as the batsman looking to drive
flighted and full, powerfully punched towards cover, Kohli throws himself to his left to field that one, Yusuf applauds the effort
beaten outside off and the batsman looks to cut off the back foot
speared into the pads, and that one is tucked towards midwicket
powerfully driven, but placement isn't great, straight at Kohli, and that's a dot ball
fullish ball that the batsman looked to drive towards cover, edged towards the leg side
a full ball on middle, Niall O'Brien lap sweeps that one towards deep fine leg
full and into legstump, driven down to long-on for a single
another sweep, this time the batsmen gets two as it is well wide of Munaf at fine leg
O'Brien looks to defend the final ball off the front foot, struck on the pads outside off, muted appeal from Chawla
short from Yusuf, Porterfield has loads of time to get back, waits for the ball to sit up and crashes it through cover
fuller this time, much better length this, defended
slows it up and tosses it up, driven firmly past mid-off for a single
length ball just outside off, blocked off the front foot
another boundary for Ireland, provides width Niall gets on the backfoot and slices it to third man for four
on the middle and leg, worked towards square leg for a single
swept again by O'Brien, from outside off this time, down to fine leg for a single

that's his fifty, brings it up with a crunching drive through extra cover for four, slightly overpitched by Chalwa and Porterfield makes him pay, he was dropped on nought and he's made sure he capitalising on that reprieve
down the leg side
on the pads this time, tucked towards midwicket
again pitching it outside leg, and spins further down
shifts his line to middle and strikes the batsman on the pads, that was sliding down leg though, so there's only a muted appeal
India being generous with the extras, Chawla oversteps this time
went for a sweep, the googly gets the top edge, and flies to leg slip
oh dear, the third leg side wide of the over, short ball that spun way down leg, the crowd don't like it and let Chawla know with loud boos
sticks to the legstump line, on the pads, defended towards square leg, that over lasted ten balls
fullish ball is thumped down the ground to long-off for a single
into middle stump this time, solidly defended
on legstump, whipped away by O'Brien for a single
flighted and full from Harbhajan, not much footwork from Porterfirle,d jus makes a wee bit of room and crunches that against the spin to long-on for four
on the pads, tucked to leg side for a single
more legstump bowling, nudged to square leg foe one more
short of a length and outside off, carved towards deep backward point, 'Two' is the call from the batsman as soon as he plays the shot
spun into Porterfield, who is cramped up by the turn, defended down the pitch
once again, Porterfield pushes it back towards the bowler
on the pads, tucked towards the leg side
on middle stump, opens the face to play the ball towards short third man
a touch short, Porterfield loves that, rocks back and punches it towards sweeper cover for a single
on the pads, driven towards mid-on for a single
outside off, pushed towards cover but placement isn't great
down the leg side, O'Brien tucks it behind square leg
pitching well outside leg and turning in, defended off the front foot

and is that a run-out? the bowling has looked limp, but Virat Kolhi's fielding has brought the breakthrough, Porterfield pushed the ball towards cover, where Kohli swooped on the ball and fired in the throw, it was a bit wide but MS Dhoni breaks the stumps in a jiffy to catch O'Brien short, that was great work from Dhoni, and a stubborn stand is finally broken
short of a length and outside off, defended off the front foot
flighted delivery, length ball that is defended back down the track
Porterfield plays his favourite shot, backs away and pushes the ball towards cover
pitching on middle and leg and turning towards off, solidly defended off the front foot
shorter and on off, blocked to the off side
length ball outside off, White gets forward and taps it to the off side
on off side, stands tall and works the ball towards point to get off the mark
fullish ball pitching outside off, worked towards midwicket
full ball on the pads, powerfully hit by Porterfield, Kohli gets a hand on it at short midwicket but can't stop the single
flighted ball, Whoite takes a huge stride forward as he looked to defend, inside-edged and the ball pops up to the leg side, safely though
swept by White behind square for a couple
another sweep, just a single this time
length ball on off, poked towards the off side, 'Noooo' shouts Porterfield as White thinks about a single

Yuvraj Singh strikes, gives the ball loads of air, pitching on a length and it turns away, well outside off, White reaches for it and  gets the outside edge and a regulation catch for Dhoni, who throws the ball up in delight
length ball pitching just outside off, defended off the front foot
again a loopy delivery on the stumps, Kevin O'Brien defends down the pitch
punched to long-off to get his first run
on legstump, blocked off the back foot
a touch short, that's enough for Porterfield to get back and lash it towards sweeper cover, he does favour that shot a lot
on the legstump, tucked towards square leg
tossed up, full and outside off, Kevin chips it over cover, lands well short of sweeper cover
'Catch it' Dhoni says a s Porterfield plays it a touch uppishly towards the bowler, lands short
on the pads, worked behind square leg for a single
fired into legstump, defended off the backfoot
that end a much better over from Chawla, a lovely legspinner that Kevin O'Brien can't get his bat close to
full ball outside off, driven along the ground to long-off
half-tracker from Yuvraj, doesn't turn much after pitching on off, swiped down the ground
length ball on off from Yuvraj, 'Catch' is the cry as Kevin O'Brien gets a leading edge towards point, he was looking to play the ball towards midwicket
on the pads, eased to fine leg for a single
length ball is defended by O'Brien towards midwicket
skips away from leg to make room and crunches that towards deep point, 'Two, two,' he shouted as soon as he played that shot
shortish and well outside off, slashed towards deep backward point
gets the ball to turn sharply, pitching just outside off and goes down the leg side
fuller ball that is pushed towards midwicket
Porterfield have a close shave, he backed away and looked to cut an outside-off ball, gets a bottom edge that nearly goes on to the stumps
worked towards wide mid-on for a single
smashed off the back foot, Kevin O'Brien gets his first boundary of the day, a muscular hit off the back foot towards extra cover, Yusuf was racing across and puts in a dive but can't cut that off
makes room and slaps the ball towards point
on the pads, eased down the ground to long-on
flatter, quicker one, heading for middle, blocked by O'Brien

a massive cheer from the crowd as Kevin O'Brien departs, a soft, soft dismissal, an innocuous length ball is patted back to the bowler, who accepts the gift, Yuvraj gets his second, and Ireland have lost a huge wicket

Cusack loses his head first ball, doesn't lose his wicket though, he opens the face to guide the ball towards point and sets off for a single, Porterfield wasn't interested, and Cusack had to scramble back, just makes it back
Cusack living dangerously here, dropped by Yuvraj, he wasn't expecting another caught and bowled, Cusack punched it high to Yiuvraj left, he gets a hand on it but can't latch on, Cusack survives
Porterfield eases the ball through the off side for a single
defended to the off side by Cusack
Cusack comes down the track and plays the ball against the spin towards mid-off, can't get off the mark though
this time he can, drives the length ball towards mid-off for one
Porterfield brings up the 150 by rocking back and slicing the ball towards cover
the Chawla googly makes an appearance, Cusack doesn't read it and is struck on the pads, Chawla makes an excited appeal but that hit outside off
worked behind square leg as Porterfield calmly marches on
flighted, length ball, defended back to the bowler
an awkward stroke from Cusack, turned towards square leg, doesn't get hold of it and it dribbles to the leg side
blocked towards the off side
Yuvraj keeps it on a length, Cusack comes well forward and blocks towards cover
a touch short from Yuvraj, Cusack quickly gets on the back foot, cracks it towards point where Chawla races across to field
slightly short after pitching outside off, Porterfield gets back and slashes it towards cover
that is a terrible delivery from Chawla, plenty of flight but forgets to land it, crunched down the ground by Cusack for four
Cusack can't read the Chawla googly, he look to defend that one towards off only to be beaten by the sharp turn

overpitched legspinner, muscled down the ground and past the bowler, Yusuf hustles across from Yusuf and dives to save that one, he pushes it past Munaf who was coming in from long-off, third umpire is satisfied it is not a boundary
the googly beats Porterfield outside off
worked to midwicket for a single to bring up drinks, Porterfield has moved on to a workmanlike 75

the drinks break strikes. Porterfield is gone to one of Yuvraj's poorer balls today. He is turning things around for India here, and this performance could force Dhoni to rethink whether he needs two specialist spinners. This, though, was a shoddy delivery. Short and turning away slowly, Porterfield rocks back and spanks it hard. Sadly, he finds Harbhajan at cover.
tossed up on off, leans out to the flight and defends down the track
fired just wide of off stump, driven solidly to mid off
Yuvraj lands one on the pads and Mooney dinks it away to square leg for a single
back of a length on off stump and defended down the track

in hindsight, a rather brainy shot from Cusack. He skips out of the crease, gets inside the angle that Yuvraj is operating with, negating the spin in the process and then slaps him across the line high and into the vacant midwicket region. It trickles over the boundary skirting.
tossed up outside off and breaking away, defended softly towards point
hint of drift, coming in towards off stump, lands outside the line and breaks away as Mooney leaves
more air, Mooney comes forward to one that doesn't turn so much, and defends to the off side
that's dropped really short, Mooney is late on the cut and can't get it away
drift and curl into the batsman before landing outside off and straightening as Mooney decides to leave
a maiden for Harbhajan, he gets one to come in marginally with the arm and Mooney almost caught napping as he plays all over it. Gets some bat on it, onto the pads.

Cusack does it again to Yuvraj, he's skipped out to take the delivery on bounce from the leg stump line and swing it over midwicket. Straighter than last time, but he seemed to have negated all risks in the execution
Yuvraj lands this outside off, forces Cusack to play softly into the off side
aha, this one stops and breaks away from Cusack who is a little early into the punch down the ground, and Yuvraj might have thought he had a chance as he dived to his left. Too far from him though.
Mooney gets one on the pads, and clips down to square leg for a single

this is lovely stuff from Yuvraj, and another nifty bit of keeping from Dhoni. Flighted onto middle and leg, it lands and breaks away sharply as Cusack plays a lazy wafty flick without getting to the pitch. Dhoni collects and whips the bails off as Cusack drags his toes out, but he seems to have brought them back in, just in time.
short ball, breaking away from middle and off, whipped from the crease to square leg for one
back of a length on the pads, clipped through square leg for one
again on leg stump, Mooney is early on the flick and gets a leading edge to midwicket where Yuvraj tumbled and saved
back of a length and very straight, defended from the crease to midwicket
on off stump this time, Mooney looks for the dab to third man, but finds Kohli at point
Zaheer is looking for reverse. 131 kph only, but it tailed in sharply at a very full length and was defended back down the track.
another yorker attempted, this one ends up a full toss on leg stump, squeezed away to square leg for a single
speared in from outside off and defended from the crease to the off side
back of a length, but ample air on that one on leg stump, Cusack swipes down the ground for a single
flatter and on off stump, Mooney tries to force it from the back foot and gets it past Yuvraj
Cusack turns the strike again, full toss on off stump and driven into the covers

Mooney reviews an lbw appeal upheld by umpire Tucker. Yuvraj continues to impress - this is not part-time stuff. Looped up just outside off, and turning in sharply as Mooney presses half forward to defend. He did not get his pad out of the line, and was struck in front of off. Only height could have saved him, but the tracker predicts this to be clipping the top of middle. On your way, Mooney.
flat delivery to end the over, and again some turn. Defended gingerly from the crease.
short ball outside off, hangs back and cuts it backward of point for one
short ball again, as Zaheer angles in from over the stumps, bunted carefully to the leg side
driven to deep cover, Johnston is away
slow offcutter from over the wicket, opens the face and dabs it to third man for a single
tucks him up with a length ball that doesn't do much off the track, and Johnston can't get it away as he looks for the steer through the off side
slow offcutter again, lands on leg and moves away as Johnston looks to steer square. Can't get it away.
tossed up outside off and breaking away, steered carefully from the crease through point
Yuvraj continues to get turn nicely, Johnston stabs at one as it breaks away
this one drifts away down the leg side as Johnston misses the flick
again drifting with the arm, Johnston looks to swipe to the leg side and misses. Hmm, replays say that was hitting leg stump

India have called for a lbw review here. Has Yuvi bagged a five-for? Lands back of a length on off stump and straightens, but the batsman is well down the track, his backfoot is a foot outside the crease and his front foot is well down the track. Will the 2.5 metres come into the picture? According to (a potentially inaccurate) HawkEye, since he is more than 2.5 m forward, it was hitting off and middle at a comfortable height. Right, on replays, umpire Tucker has reversed his decision and Yuvraj has five. Bangalore roars. Yuvraj puts out his hand, with all five fingers spread out. Dhoni just smiles. Good stuff this.
flat armer that held its line, defended tentatively from the crease.
tossed up again with flair on middle and off, driven into the covers
full delivery from Zaheer, looking for the yorker, squeezed out into the covers
over-pitched outside off, Dockrell squeezes it down to third man for a single
Zak tried, well, something. And lost the plot. A foot and a half wide down the leg side
127.8 kph bouncer that goes searching for the batsman's head, Dockrell gets out of the way
full delivery outside off, Dockrell goes for a full-blooded cover drive and he finds covers
again a very full ball and driven solidly through mid off for a single
offcutter at 127 kph, nips away from the middle and leg line and is defended from the crease to the off side
short of a length and no movement, conventional or reverse, clipped through backward square for a single
again back of a length, Dockrell stays behind the line and defends to the off side
he changes it up, offers one to drive and Dockrell drives fluently. Unfortunately, cover comes in the way
back of a length, seemed to come slowly off the track as Dockrell looked for the dab to third man, and missed.
Munaf spears one too far down and it is called a wide
holds the length back and it ends up on the hips, Dockrell calmly tucks it through square leg for one
Munaf delivers a shocker to end his over, slanting into Johnston's pads with fine leg inside the circle, and is calmly glanced to the right of that fielder for four easy runs
Zaheer sends down another offcutter that nips away outside off stump, and is steered down to third man
again dropped short of a length outside off, Zaheer is not giving pace or length to work with. Dabbed into the covers, just can't time it
118.9 kph, slow yorker on the stumps and Johnston just about brings the bat down in time to keep it out
botched by Zaheer, biffed by Johnston. He overcooks the yorker and ends up delivering a full toss at a nice height. It is swatted down the ground, to the left of mid on for a single

Big lbw appeal turned down, Dhoni and Zaheer decide to refer it. Full from over the wickets, and the main question is - did it pitch outside leg, or in line? His the pads in front of leg and is headed to break the furniture. The mat is in, and it pitched outside leg. Saved.

Dhoni may not be considered among the better keepers in the game, but he's been stunning today. Full delivery outside off, it was there for the drive and Dockrell went for the off side with a flamboyant carve. He ended getting a very thick outside edge that seemed headed for third man. Someone forgot to inform the horizontal Indian captain. He was fully stretched to the right and pouched it inches above the ground. And he doesn't celebrate. Calm as always, flicks the ball away and heads to Zaheer for the celebrations.

aha, what happened there? Yuvraj actually has made a mistake in the field. Slower ball on the stumps, Johnston mistimes the flicked hoick and it balloons up behind midwicket. Yuvraj was running back, but inexplicably, pulled out of it. Was there a miscommunication with Kohli who was running in?
full delivery in line with middle, Johnston bunts down the ground and gets a single
Rankin is away, staying beside the line of a wide delivery outside off and guiding a single past point for a single
Johnston is getting some important runs here, drives a full length ball down the ground with deft hands, playing it softly enough for a couple

Given lbw, and Johnston reviews it immediately. Munaf got some prodigious inward dip on this, it landed on middle and you could see Johnston's middle and off stumps as he went for the flick and missed. The predictive path of HawkEye says that is hitting leg stump. The umpire's call stays, and Ireland have been bowled out.

inn2.comm: Sehwag has got a boundary off the first time for the third match in a row, it was a back of a length ball outside off, not much wrong with that, tell Sehwag that, he just stands tall and punches it through cover
on the pads this time, whipped down to fine leg for a single which brings the crowd favourite on strike
Sachin too gets away with a boundary, it was overpitched on the pads, minimal effort from Sachin as he tucks it to the square leg boundary
slightly shorter, and on the same line, Tendulkar looks to nudge this to square leg as well, he doesn't connect, that was going down leg
crowd expecting a boundary every ball, hard to hit this one though, short of length and on offstump, blocked by Tendulkar
another good delivery to end the over, on offstump, slightly shorter than the previous one, defended off the back foot

the famous chicken dance come out as Virender Sehwag gets a leading edge back to the bowler, he was looking to play it to the leg side, it pops back to Johnston who collects and sets off on a celebratory dance
good first delivery to Gambhir, just short of length and outside off, blocked to the off side
just outside off, angling across the batsman who shoulders arms
well outside off. left alone by Gambhir again
short of a length delivery on off, no room for Gambhir, defended
length ball on the pads, tucked to square leg for a single to end the over
short of length again, just outside off, Gambhir leaves it to the keeper
very close to the offstump, once more no stroke offered by Gambhir
on the thigh pad, brushed towards short fine leg
good delivery from Rankin, gets that one to bounce sharply from short of a length, Tendulkar has to jump to defend that one
length ball on off, Tendulkar defends solidly
strays on to the pads, whipped to fine leg for a single
keeps it tight around off, Tendulkar drops it to the leg side, Johnston races across to field
superb stroke from Tendulkar, and superb fielding from Johnston, the trademark Sachin straight drive, Johnston extended his right arm as the ball was speeding back to do the fielding
a bouncer, just to show it isn't going to be all line-and-length bowling, but that is too high
short of length ball and just outside off, gets forward and blocks the ball towards cover
nicely judged single, drops the ball towards cover and sets off immediately, Gambhir responds and a sharp single is taken

a shot that Gambhir loves fetches him four, comes down the track and square cuts the ball hard, he moved towards the leg side as well when he comes out of the crease, gave him the room to get the power behind that shot
on the pads this time, Gambhir gets behind the line and blocks
Tendulkar mistimes that one, it's in the air for a bit but lands well short of extra cover and mid-off
short of length and outside off, Tendulkar leaves it to the keeper
an awkward shot from Tendulkar, went for the pull but couldn't time it, bat turned in his hand as he played the shot, the ball rolls towards mid-on
length ball on the pads, clever batting from Gambhir, he shuffles across and tucks it to fine leg for four, Rankin has his hands on his head
length ball this time on middle and off, defended down the pitch
short and wide, Gambhir jumps as he looks to force the ball through covers, completely mistimes, the ball dribbles towards cover
on legstump, comes on slowly, Gambhir waits and defends from the crease

no chicken dance this time, but Johnston has struck again, Gambhir is gone, that wasn't a great delivery,  and it wasn't a great shot either, length ball on legstump, Gambhir looks to tuck it past short fine, he can only chip it to the fielder there,  the Chinnaswamy is silenced
short of length and outside off, left alone by Kohli
fuller from Johnston, Kohli gets forward and blocks it to the off side
short of length ball, just outside off, defended by Kohli
short of length ball outside off, Kohli defends towards cover to complete a wicket maiden
he's greeted with a classic drive through cover for four by Tendulkar, it was given plenty of air and outside off, a length ball, Tendulkar gets well forward and caresses that through the field
length ball again, closer to off, Tendulkar comes well forward again and defends
short from Dockrell, Tendulkar quickly onto the backfoot and cracks it towards cover,doesn't get the gap as a dive from the fielder takes the pace off the ball
Kohli gets off the mark with a calm drive along the ground to long-off
length ball outside off, Tendulkar defends towards the off side
more length bowling, outside off, measured defence to the off side
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards short cover
length ball on middle and off, Kohli moves across and tucks it towards deep square leg
keeps Tendulkar quiet with a tight line, on offstump and back of a length, Tendulkar stands tall as he blocks
full and outside off, Tendulkar opens the face to guide the ball towards third man
short of length and well outside off, pushed towards point by Kohli
slanting down leg, Tendulkar shuffles across and looks to tuck it towards square leg, defended to the leg side
length ball outside off, carefully defended off the front foot towards the off side
short of length and outside off, Kohli gets his front leg out of the way and whacks it, can't beat the fielder
once more he powers the ball towards cover, the gap proves elusive
on the pads, tucked to midwicket, he's looking for the big hit but can't get the gap
tossed up by Dockrell, Kohli looks to deposit that in the stands but ends up getting a thick inside-edge past the keeper and the stumps for four to fine leg
punched off the backfoot towards the bowler, to end a good over for Dockrell and Ireland
short of length on middle and leg, Tendulkar looks to tuck it to the leg side but can't middle it
fuller this time, Tendulkar gets well forward and pushes the ball towards cover
lovely from Tendulkar, a length ball on off, Tendulkar punishes it with a push past mid-off, no power but that ball was speeding away from the fielder
roar from the crowd as Tendulkar eases a short ball on offstump towards third man, just makes a bit of room to dab that one for a single
short of length ball, only 125kmh, and outside off, defended by Kohli to the off side, Johnston looks to be struggling
keeps it around off, Kohli steers that one to third man for a single to end the first Powerplay
flighted again from Dockrell, length ball outside off, punched towards mid-off by Kohli
Kohli again tries to power the ball, he can't get it past mid-on after charging out of the crease
pushed wide of the short extra cover fielder
forced towards short extra, powerfully hit towards Kevin O'Brien there, he dives to field, crowd thought they was a chance of a catch, but it was a bump ball
nearly a run-out, Kohli plays it behind square leg and responds to a call from Tendulkar, a direct hit at the non-striker's end could have ended Kohli's stay
defended towards point by Tendulkar
Mooney starts with a half-tracker, sat up for Kohli, who dismisses it to the deep backward square leg boundary, Mooney's too slow to be trying the bouncer, especially on this track
guides the ball towards backward point for a single
short of length ball outside off, Kohli slashes at it, gets the top edge which flies past the keeper and to third man for a single
slanting into middle, defended by Tendulkar towards the leg side
short of length again, just outside off, Tendulkar carves that one to sweeper cover
full ball on legstump, whipped towards midwicket by Kohli
like Mooney, he starts with a terrible delivery, very short and down the leg side, punished by Kohli, who powers it to backward square leg
tapped to square leg by Kohli for a single
on offstump, pushed towards the off side for a single
punched off the back foot to short midwicket
muscled down the ground for a single
length ball on middle, Tendulkar tucks it behind square leg
just outside off, Tendulkar backs away to make room and delicately dabs it to short third
pushed off the back foot in front of point for a single
a touch short from Dockrell, and outside off, slapped in front of point for another single
flighted from Dockrell, length ball outside off, defended towards point, no single this time
back of length ball on middle, solidly defended
length ball well outside off, Tendulkar looks to chip that one over cover, he does, but wasn't fully in control, bottom hand came off as he played that stroke
on offstump, Tendulkar gets well back in the crease, tucked behind square leg for a single
poor ball from Stirling, very short and turns way down leg, Kohli pondered whether to power it to the leg side but leaves it alone
went back  and punched to long-on
length ball outside off, pushed to the right of the bowler, who quickly gets across to field
length ball on legstump, turned behind square leg
length ball on middle and leg stump, pushed back to the bowler
short of length ball outside off, defended carefully by Tendulkar
length ball on offstump, defended to square leg, Kohli charges down for a single but he is sent back
length ball on offstump, clipped to the leg side
comes down the track and punches it to long-on for a single
on middle stump, tucked towards square leg
stopped in his delivery stride to see whether the batsman would charge, he didn't, waited and pushed it down the ground
just outside off, Tendulkar makes room and dinks the ball towards short third man for a single
back of a length and turning in, punched down the ground
Kohli gets a similar delivery and plays down the track
whoa, sterling effort from Stirling, summons his inner Murali and gets one to turn in like a monster. Kohli was looking to cut it, and got some glove on it, as opposed to bat. Hmm. Leg slip moves in.
tossed up and turning in again, Kohli defends down the track
flight again, Kohli gets across to the pitch and works it through mid on for one
stays on the crease and plays a short of length ball turning into him, back down the track
tossed up on the stumps and driven with the spin through wide mid-on for a single

cheeky from Sachin. He's done this to almost all the spinners who have bowled at him, since the late 80s. Tossed up and turning down the leg side, he moves the front foot across and lap sweeps to fine leg.
White stops in his action and then delivers a full ball on off stump, Sachin drives calmly down to long on for one
tossed up outside off, Kohli gets inside the line and drives into the covers against the spin
Sachin works with the spin through the leg side. Easy runs everywhere against the spinners
Kohli stays on the crease and defends down the track
Stirling is getting it to turn well here, Sachin tries to lean across and smother the spin but it spits in towards the pads.
this time Sachin gets to the pitch and works the wrists to get it to midwicket
speared onto the pads this time, easy single for Sachin as he works it to the leg side
Kohli chips an easy single to the on side, hanging back and turning the wrists
over-pitched outside off, you can't get Sachin there. He reaches across and fluently redirects it into the covers
tossed up outside off, Kohli manages to ease it with the spin through midwicket to end the over
slips the first one onto Kohli's pads and he gets a leg bye to the leg side
short ball outside Sachin's off stump, he rocks back and crunches it through backward point for a single
short of a length again, Kohli hangs back and steers with an angled face to third man for a single
over-pitched on the pads, Sachin drives solidly to long on for one. Sunny Gavaskar waxes eloquent on the straightness of the bat. A little over-the-top, I'd say.
short of a length outside off stump, Kohli stands up and punches into the covers
Kohli is content to play off the back foot, works a delivery from outside off into the leg side

The left-arm charm works. Sachin is out. Dockrell has removed the big man. Innocuous delivery. Tossed up on middle stump and straightening. Sachin went down on a knee to play the sweep through square leg. He missed and was struck on the right thigh. He discussed long and hard with Kohli is it was worth reviewing. In the end he decided against it, and just as well. That was plumb, heading for leg and middle. Could not have been plumber if he was working with pipes and taps. Peterson, Yuvraj and now Dockrell... What's it with left-arm spinners today?!
tossed up on middle and leg, Yuvraj works it with the spin to mid on
Yuvraj is away, on-driving a flighted ball through wide mid on for a single
Kohli drives with the spin this time, to the right of cover and away for another single
Yuvraj hangs back in the crease and plays very carefully as one turns in from off stump
Yuvi chips out of the crease and drives solidly down to long on for a single
tossed up on off and driven carefully into the covers
works a tossed up ball on the pads to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj reaches out and defends

nicely played, Yuvraj gets one on the toes and clips it very fine through fine leg for a couple. And thankfully, Sunny Gavaskar is not on air to compare it with Ranji's leg glance. Oh wait, he is on air, but wasn't speaking at that moment.
short ball, sits up outside off and Yuvraj quickly rocks back and guides into the covers for a single
tossed up outside off, he reaches out and dabs into the covers for a single
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj plays solidly down the track
tossed up again on middle and leg, clipped through midwicket for a single. Timed too well for the second run.
Kohli leans half out of the crease and defends with the turn into the off side
whoa, dropped by the keeper as Kohli tries to cut a delivery that was too full for the shot. Niall can't hold on to the edge. Hmm.
Yuvraj tickles another single through the leg side, reaches out and clips to midwicket
Kohli hangs back and forces a short of length ball into the covers for one more
tossed up, some loop there and turn into Kohli who defends
Kohli reaches out and chips a little airily down to long on for a single, the 100th run of the innings. He would have timed that better if not for the turn. It went off the inside half of the bat.
generously flighted on off stump, Yuvraj drives straight to short cover

Is this game turning? Kohli is run out. Not the first time we have seen poor running from the Indian top-order. Short ball, turning away from Yuvraj and he goes for the cut. He played it pretty square, in that area where no one is sure whose call it is. Kohli thought there was a single, and ran almost all the way down. However, he seemed to stutter on the way. Yuvraj was initially sold on the single, but once he saw Kohli hesitate, he himself stopped. The throw to the bowler's end was not the most accurate, but it was good enough to catch Kohli well short.
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj is driving well here, and gets a single wide of mid off
turns into Dhoni's pads and he works it square for a single.
short of a length and turning into Dhoni's pads, worked away to midwicket
ahem, Dhoni lunges out to the pitch and eases the ball into midwicket and begins to scoot down the track. Yuvi sends him back, just in time
Dhoni hangs back and forces into the covers for a single
incisive lengths, turning well from leg stump, Yuvraj plays from the crease and defends
this one comes in with the arm, Yuvraj punches to midwicket where Mooney does well to cut off the single
ah, one bad ball has ruined a truly intense over. Yuvraj sees a marginal drop in length and pounces onto the backfoot before launching it regally almost all the way to the midwicket boundary.
full length ball on off stump, Dhoni is stuck on the back foot as he pokes out into the covers
this one is a foot outside off, and Dhoni watches it closely on the way to the keeper
lovely bowling. Hayward wouldn't have minded that, it landed short of a length, pushing Dhoni back and then it jagged away off the seam, just past Dhoni's prod in hope.
full again, some more pace and he could have the captain in trouble. Dhoni is again late coming forward to defend

marginally short, Dhoni is anxious to make the over count and goes for release with a pull shot, and he gets it backward of square leg. Dhoni's possibly the fastest runner in this team and he hares back for two
short of a length to end the over, and angling into Dhoni who defends cautiously
tossed up from round the wicket on Yuvraj's off stump, driven fluidly to long off for one
tossed up outside off, Dhoni leans out to the pitch and drives against the spin through extra cover for one
the stop and see before delivering the ball routine from White, Yuvraj waits and guides the cut to the deep for a single
aha, this one turns in sharply and comes on slowly, Dhoni had to adjust his cut shot and eventually doubled up in shock as it came in and popped up off the bat to the off side
ohh, White. Full-toss outside off, Dhoni hands out the punishment. Cover-driven to the gallows.
again flight, this time it lands and breaks in. Dhoni plays against the spin to mid off where Johnston (I think) does well to stop it
length ball from over the wicket, Yuvraj plays it from the crease but keeps it out safely since it doesn't move off the track
hits the deck this time and hurries Yuvraj into the steered cut, and he gets a single to third man.
short delivery angled into Dhoni who skips across and nurdles through square leg. He thinks of two, but the fielder in the deep runs in like the wind to deny him strike;.
short of a length on leg and middle, Yuvraj hangs back again and pokes into the leg side
short ball this time, enough width for the cut, but Yuvraj can't find the gap. Chopped into the ground, and on the bounce to the point man
finishes with one on a fuller length around off stump and this time, Yuvraj comes forward to angle it to point
tossed up and turning in, Dhoni works it to midwicket for one
short but not wide enough for the cut, Yuvraj flat-bats without timing into the covers
this one is short and wide as well, but Yuvraj again finds the fielder with a well-timed cut
hustles him on to the backfoot with a quicker one and it is bunted back to the bowler
this time on the pads, Yuvraj works it throught midwicket for one
Dhoni tries to winkle another single to the leg side, but can't get the gap

top fielding this. Short ball outside off, Yuvraj plays his go-to shot, the crunched cut, and it is parried by the point fielder diving to his left. Porterfield at cover-point tidies up and Yuvraj can't get even one for it
and the frustration from that ball nearly cost him his wicket here. Short delivery, bustling in at 131 kph without room, but Yuvraj went for the hurried pull and missed. So close to the edge.
another short ball, comes off the pitch really fast and Yuvraj is caught on the hop after thinking of the pull
this is smart, very smart. Just for a change, he delivers a full ball outside off and seens if Yuvraj wants to drive. He doesn't
another bouncer like he means it. They aren't clocking too many kph on the speedos, but the direction is impeccable. Yuvraj again hops out of the way
ends with another feeler outside off, Yuvraj lets it go. Superb maiden from Rankin.
turns away from off stump, Dhoni pushes with the spin into the covers for one
turns into Yuvraj's pads from outside off, he tucks it carefully to the leg side, but can't get a single
slower through the air, Yuvraj waits and nurdles backward of square for a single
dropped short this time, Dhoni hangs back and whacks it through covers for a single

oho, what happened there? Yuvraj gets a short ball, well outside off, and goes for the pull. He doesn't time it that wekk and gets it down to long on, and the fielder is standing quite wide. He runs across and stops the boundary, but Dhoni hares back for two

an impeccable on-drive. Landed outside off and was turning in, but he had to get the front foot well across to reach the pitch of the ball. Once he did that, the placement came next. He spanked it with a flourish to the left of Dockrell, well to the right of short midwicket and even the man running to his right from wide long-on cuts it off
Rankin angles one sharply into Dhoni who misses the flick. Hits the pad, but surely going down the leg side
over-pitched on leg stump, Dhoni is reluctant to get forward, but drives to mid on for a quick single
there are green-shirts everywhere in the off side. Short ball, not wide enough for the cut so Yuvraj tries to steer, and finds backward point
Yuvraj gets a single off Rankin after a long time, short ball tucking him up and he clips it square for a single
Dhoni jumps to the off side, then spreads the feet wide and punches with ugly efficiency into the covers for one more
length ball to end the over, on Yuvraj's leg stump and defended carefully to the leg side.
Dhoni gets back and defends towards short mid-off
swiped off the back foot towards mid-on, too hard to get a single
typical Dhoni shot, gets forward and then thrusts his bat well in front of the pad to work the ball towards point
defended off the back foot towards point
beaten outside off as he attempts a footwork-free poke, Dockrell has his hands on his head
defended off the front foot towards extra cover, Yuvraj races out of the blocks, and is then sent back
full and wide, Yuvraj punches it towards cover for a single
'Catch it' is the call as Dhoni plays the ball slightly uppishly towards mid-off, lands well short though
short of length and homing into middle, Dhoni defends to the off side
overpitched by Cusack, and that's all Dhoni needs, its powered down the ground past a diving mid-off for four, no follow through at all in the stroke
gets a single this time, in front of square leg
one more single to end the over, Yuvraj glides the ball to third man for an ambled run (oxymoron alert)
full ball just outside off, punched back to the bowler
full and outside leg, worked towards deep square leg
length ball outside off, tucked to the leg side for a scrambled single
another single, leading edge from Yuvraj as he looks to work the ball to the leg side, Dhoni sprints the single, and there's an overthrow to be had as well
tossed up and way down leg, a free run
much better this, length ball and outside off, defended
overpitched and Yuvraj muscles it down the track, the bowler responds quickly to block that though
short of length ball angling into off, defended towards mid-off, Cusack doesn't give any width
just outside off, Dhoni opens the face to guide the ball towards backward point
length ball, heading for middle and off, punched off the front foot towards mid-off
short of length and does give width this time, whipped towards deep backward point
nicely done by Yuvraj, slight amount of width and he dabs the ball behind backward point and towards third man
full delivery, shovelled down the ground in Dhoni style for a single
and once more Dhoni punches the ball past a diving bowler to pick up a single
short ball heading for off, punched towards mid-on
driven down the ground towards long-off for a single
the fifty stand comes up with another sensible single towards long-off, Dhojni and Yuvraj have decided to put the pyrotechnics away and play some safe cricket
beaten outside off as he looks to defend, stifled appeal for caught behind
pushed off the front foot to the off side, a good over for Ireland that

ooh, Dhoni has a close shave, a big inside-edge as the ball slants into him, it cannons off the pads and loops up in front of him and to his left, the keeper raced towards it, bowler also went for it as did midwicket, the ball eludes all three though, that could have changed the game
works a length ball from offstump towards cover for a single
crouches as he opens the face and steers the ball to point
put away by Yuvraj, that was a poor ball from Cusack, a low full toss on legstump, hit me it said, and Yuvraj did, whacks it wide of deep midwicket
just outside off, Yuvraj guides that one to third man for a single to keep strike
short of length ball, just outside off, defended to the leg side
Dhoni goes right back in the crease, twirls it towards sweeper cover
Yuvraj comes down the track, but the ball is short and he is struck on the pad outside off
fullish ball outside off, Dhoni pushes it towards cover
tossed up and just outside off, Dhoni pushes the ball behind point, these two are in charge now
slightly quicker, and on the pads, Yuvraj defends to the leg side
short of length ball angling in, Dhoni shuffles across to work the ball behind square leg
length ball on middle and leg, blocked to the leg side
short of length and outside off, Dhoni plays an innovative shot, not pretty on the eye though, to get the ball away to square leg
on the pads from Rankin, worked down to fine leg for yet another single
back of a length and just outside off, defended towards the off by Dhoni after he walks across the stumps
opened him up with that delivery, but no luck for Rankin, the outside edge flies past the keeper and down to third man for another single

is there still a twist? Dhoni has been given out lbw by Rod Tucker, Dhoni had taken a big stride forward and was hit on the back leg, that pitched on middle and off, and was going on to hit middle and leg, there's no inside-edge either, by the time the review upheld the decision to give him out, Dhoni was nearly back in the pavilion, a day to cherish for Dockrell, getting two of the biggest names in the game, first Sachin and now Dhoni
full ball on legstump, forcefully hit towards the bowler
Pathan wants to finish this off, he rocks back to a slightly short ball and swipes it to cow corner, it wasn't off the middle or that would have gone into the stands
fullish ball and Yusuf shows off his hitting skills again, a clean strike sends the ball soaring towards the sight screen, hardly seemed to put any power behind that
looks for the big hit again, mistimed it back towards the bowler
massive! six more from Yusuf, that was murdered by Yusuf, he gets forward and clubs it over long-on, far into the stands that was
outside off, hits the pad and goes past the diving keeper
the crowd has come alive with those hits from Yusuf, they expect more from him, he just tucks a length ball towards square leg for a single
way down the leg side
sprays it outside off this time, too far to be legit, Rankin needs to get his line right here
short of length ball heading for middle, clipped towards midwicket for one run
no foot work from Yusuf as he fishes at one outside off, he doesn't get bat on ball
speared in towards the base of off, jabbed towards mid-off by Yusuf
length ball heading for middle this time, Yusuf gets across and defends unconvincingly
length ball on middle and off, Yuvraj defends with exaggerated caution
fires it in towards off, more forward defence from Yuvraj
full and a bit of flight this time, Yuvraj thumps it towards sweeper cover
a half-tracker from Stirling, slipping down leg, Yusuf helps it to short fine leg
lovely fielding from Ireland, Yusuf had timed his off-drive beautifully, a diving stop from short cover
fired down leg again, Yusuf works it wide of short fine leg
length ball outside off, poked towards point for a scrambled single
that one goes right through Yuvraj, a bit of movement in off the pitch, he was looking to defend but it goes between bat and body and through to the keeper
worked towards midwicket by Yuvraj for a single to get off the strike
short ball just outside leg, Yusuf moves across the stumps and lets it go, expecting the wide perhaps but it isn't called
short of a length and outside off, defended towards backward point
short of length ball into middle and leg, defended by Yusuf
tipped off the pads to backward square leg for one
over-pitched outside off, Yusuf can't time the drive to mid off.
turned in a bit, defended to midwicket
hammers this one out of the ground, gets the length he wanted and that one flies over long-on for six more

confused running there, Yusuf played it to midwicket, Yuvraj wanted a single and was halfway down the track, Yusuf didn't want one, he sends Yuvraj back, and he has to dive to make sure he beats the throw
fired in flat, Yusuf content to defend
overpitched and just outside off, punched towards long-on for a single
length ball outside off, Yusuf opens the face to guide the ball towards short third man, they may not be any more big hits from Yusuf as Yuvraj is close to a half-century
slanting into middle, works the ball to square leg
what a hit that is, Yuvraj has been very controlled in his batting today, a low full toss and this is whipped over mid-on as he walks down the track
Yuvraj gets to his half-century, the first man to make 50 and take five in the same match in the World Cup, he got to the milestone by pushing the ball towards mid-off

Yusuf finishes it off, Ireland tried hard but couldn't pull off another miracle at the Chinnaswamy, a short ball on legstump, Yusuf walks across and pulls it to the boundary to bring up the winning runs
